mapper.insert: insert into deleted_device ( id, org_id, device_name, device_type, sn, esnorimei, belong, device_status, user_id, os_version, phone_number, app_versoin, ip, power, resolution, udid, capacity, last_login_time, last_collection_time, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, delete_time, irr_status, lost_status, break_status, visit_status, is_active, sd_card, device_unique_id, longitude, latitude, flux, statistical_time )values( #{id}, #{orgId}, #{device_name}, #{device_type}, #{sn}, #{esnoOrImei}, #{belong}, #{device_status}, #{userId}, #{osVersion}, #{phoneNumber}, #{appVersion}, #{ip}, #{power}, #{resolution}, #{udid}, #{capacity}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{last_collection_time}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateTime}, #{updateBy}, #{deleteTime}, #{irr_status}, #{lost_status}, #{break_status}, #{visit_status}, #{isActive}, #{sdCard}, #{deviceUniqueId}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{flux}, now() )
